reviews.review_msg: Absolutely amazing professor. By far my favourite.
Great prof! Very easygoing, organized lectures, and welcoming of students' comments. Clear marker and straightforward about assignment expectations. Highly recommend!
He is a GREAT Prof!  He is very clear and easy to understand.  He makes all students feel comfortable no matter what they say.  If I can I will take him again!

Not the greatest lecture skills but the books and the course content are worthwhile. As mentioned the assignments can be very time consuming so be aware if taking a heavy course load or if you don't like creative projects.

I loved Stephen! the course i took was 4 hours once a week which was a bit hard to sit through. Stephen himself is amazing though, he is a great lecturer and a very interesting guy. I wasn't crazy about the readings as it was all poetry. He is a pretty fair marker.
Nice Guy. Terrible Poet and terrible lecturer. Completely unprepared, spent significant amounts of time showing us YouTube videos and rambling without purpose. Who gave this guy tenure?

Steve's a good guy.  The only English classes I haven't been bored out of my mind were with him.
 Definately recommend taking classes with him.
great prof - obviously loves what he does - awesome smile!
